title: I Tried Foilyage, and It Supercharged My Blond Hair | Flipboard
text: I Tried Foilyage, and It Supercharged My Blond Hair As a chronically blond person, I'm always looking for the next hair color trend or technique to enhance my highlights. No matter what the trend is, I have a few key requirements: an easy grow-out (I'm not a fan of a dark root line), low-maintenance upkeep (I prefer to keep my color appointments … Related storyboards Related articles [Wolf Cuts are Trending—These 21 Takes on the Cut are Perfect for Your Next Style](/@newbeauty2024/hair-khpqu6khz/wolf-cuts-are-trending-these-21-takes-on-the-cut-are-perfect-for-your-next-style/a-T6rUEY1ZR6idVaLtOgslPA%3Aa%3A4078094637-39444ad342%2Fnewbeauty.com) Emma McIntyre / Fiona Goodall / Getty Images TikTok has a new hair obsession every week, but the wolf cut has been one of the few hairstyles with … [Cynthia Nixon's living room color revives an outdated '80s design trend – it's one of the most coveted shades of 2024](/@homesgardens/homes-gardens-news-9ms8cti7z/cynthia-nixon-s-living-room-color-revives-an-outdated-80s-design-trend-it-s-o/a-QgNtHrizTUCBv9p1yYiDtg%3Aa%3A3219003438-9ab8d84cb8%2Fhomesandgardens.com) In the '80s, brown was the hottest color in interior design.
